content: errata under *crown shaping* round 8 should read as follows round 8 * k1 k2tog * repeat to end of round => 14 ** 16 ** stitches remaining this pattern includes both a worsted weight and dk weight version gauge information above is for the dk version also have listed a 2nd version using worsted weight yarn 20 stitches = 4 inches in stocking stitch pattern head circumference is 11 25 inches
